gui.chipscurioslight.config.ARMOR_STAND_: ArmorStand Open Menu Use Key Modifier
Modifier key to open the Armor Stand menu with the Use key (Default: Right Click). Default: SHIFT
gui.chipscurioslight.config.TIMEOUT_SECO: Armor Stand Menu Timeout in seconds. Default: 30 seconds
gui.chipscurioslight.config.CURIOS_ITEMS: List of items to add as curios.
